troubleshooting.title: Various errors are reported when the application starts

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: Sometimes after installing a new version of various errors are reported when the application starts.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: This problem may occur if you install the application in a folder in which an older version of the application was previously installed. Especially on Mac OSX there is a possibility for older resources, libraries from the previous application to remain in the installation folder and break the functionality of the newer application.

steps-informal.p:
Close the application and completely uninstall it, then install the application again. The user specific settings are saved in a separate folder in the user home so they will not be lost.
On Mac OSX you can move the entire application installation folder to the Trash, then re-install.
On Linux and Windows you can uninstall using the facilities provided by the installer, the re-install.
